title: Top Floor Cozy One-Bedroom Apartment with Walking Distance to UCSF
posting_body: If this advertisement is up then the apartment is still available for rent.
If you are interested, please email or text me at
with a brief introduction of yourself & roommate (if any), and your intended move-in date.
We will set up an in-person showing as soon as we can.
Utilities (Electricity, Gas, Water, Garbage): $100 for one person, $175 for two people
-Located in the heart of Inner Sunset 7th Ave & Kirkham St
-Quiet, nice, safe & convenient location; 93 walk score, 69 transit score, and A crime grade
-An easy walk to nearby top-rated restaurants, cafes, and grocery stores
-5 mins walking distance to UCSF Parnassus Campus, 10 mins walking distance to Golden Gate Park
-N-Judah Muni line is a block away providing direct service to Downtown and the Financial District
-Total gross income of 2.5 times monthly rent.
-Provide the most 2 recent payroll stubs or bank statements to verify income.
-Provide a copy of ID or passport for all applicants.
